description:
The Alibaba Cloud CLI is a tool to manage and use Alibaba Cloud resources through a command line interface. It is written in Go and built on the top of Alibaba Cloud OpenAPI.

Alibaba Cloud Command Line Interface (Alibaba Cloud CLI) is an open source tool built on the Alibaba Cloud SDK for Go. You can use the aliyun command to interact with other Alibaba Cloud services to manage your Alibaba Cloud resources.
Alibaba Cloud CLI can directly access the Alibaba cloud product OpenAPI. You can manage and maintain your own Alibaba Cloud resources by developing the shell script based on Alibaba Cloud CLI. Make sure that you have activated the cloud product you want to use and understand the API usage of the product.
What's Changed
- build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.26.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/pull/1116
- build(deps): bump github.com/aliyun/credentials-go from 1.3.9 to 1.3.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/pull/1106
- build(deps): bump github.com/alibabacloud-go/tea-utils/v2 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/pull/1107
- check dbs 2021-01-01 by @TsinghuaDream in https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/pull/1121
- build(deps): bump github.com/alibabacloud-go/darabonba-openapi/v2 from 2.0.9 to 2.0.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/pull/1120
Full Changelog: https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-cli/compare/v3.0.224...v3.0.225
